skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Frontend development focuses on the user interface and user experience aspects of web applications. It involves using HTML,CSS,JavaScript and React.js to create interactive and visually appealing websites.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: A backend using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, and Socket.io handles server-side tasks, such as data storage, and database communication, while also enabling real-time interactions.

skills.title: DBMS
skills.description: A Database Management System (DBMS) is software that allows users to efficiently define, create, maintain, and control access to databases. It ensures data integrity, security, and consistency.

skills.title: Java With DSA
skills.description: Data structures are organized formats for efficiently storing, managing, and accessing data. Examples include arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, hash tables and performance optimization.

portfolio.title: Chat-Application
portfolio.description: I developed a chat application using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). This project involved real-time messaging, user authentication, and a responsive UI, demonstrating my proficiency in full-stack development and web socket integration.

portfolio.title: Expense Tracker
portfolio.description: I built an expense tracker using React.js, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This application features real-time data handling, dynamic UI updates, and user-friendly expense management, showcasing my front-end development skills and ability to create interactive web applications.

portfolio.title: Ecommerce-Website
portfolio.description: I created an e-commerce website using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). This project includes product listings, user authentication, a shopping cart, and order management, demonstrating my full-stack development skills and ability to build robust, scalable web applications.

testimonial.description-1: I undertook a fascinating project developing a temperature converter and Quiz test using JavaScript,Bootstrap, CSS, and HTML. This interactive tool seamlessly converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin, demonstrating my proficiency in front-end development and problem-solving skills .

I have developed various projects showcasing my front-end development skills using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and React.js. I have also created several clone projects of popular websites using React.js, which enhanced my understanding of components, state management, and routing.

I have developed several backend projects demonstrating my proficiency in server-side technologies, particularly using Node.js, Express, Mongoose, MongoDB, and Socket.io.One notable project is a Chat Application, which utilizes these technologies to enable real-time messaging..
